Miguel Araújo com António Zambujo – Dia da Procissão

Music video directed by Vasco Mendes for the artists Miguel Araújo and António Zambujo. In addition to the technical assistance, we were responsible for the production of the music video for the song “Dia da Procissão”. The project was shot entirely in the village of Dornelas, located in Vila Real.

Miguel Araújo
